merits.name: Acute Senses
merits.desc: Add Blood Potency as a bonus to use senses or identify sensory details. Exceptional successes can temporarily inflict Obsession.

merits.name: Atrocious
merits.desc: Take 8-Again to evoke the monstrous Beast, but lose 10-Again to evoke or resist the seductive or competitive Beast.

merits.name: Bloodhound
merits.desc: Smelling blood is as good as tasting it for your Kindred Senses.

merits.name: Claws of the Unholy
merits.desc: When you use Unnatural Aspect claws in frenzy, their weapon rating becomes +0A.

merits.name: Close Family
merits.desc: Blood sympathy manifests as if blood ties were one step closer, with a +1 bonus and 8-Again, but you can't spend Willpower for bonus dice in a scene where you've felt it.

merits.name: Cutthroat
merits.desc: Take 8-Again to evoke the competitive Beast, but lose 10-Again to evoke or resist the monstrous or seductive Beast.

merits.name: Distinguished Palate
merits.desc: All Taste of Blood successes are exceptional, but you lose the first Vitae ingested in a scene from any vessel without a chosen trait you consider a delicacy.

merits.name: Dream Visions
merits.desc: Once a night, when meeting a new person or visiting a new place, roll Blood Potency to have had prophetic dreams that answer a question about the subject.

merits.name: Enticing
merits.desc: Take 8-Again to evoke the seductive Beast, but lose 10-Again to evoke or resist the monstrous or competitive Beast.

merits.name: Feeding Grounds
merits.desc: You hold known influence over territory. While there, add dots in this Merit as a bonus to hunt, and to clash with the Predatory Aura.

merits.name: Ghoul Retainers
merits.desc: As retainer, except they have dots in the regnant's disciplines equal to half the dots in this merit, rounded up.

merits.name: Herd
merits.desc: You have marks willing to offer up twice your dots in this Merit in Vitae weekly, without a roll.

merits.name: Honey Trap
merits.desc: A vampire who tastes your blood regains Willpower, and also takes a beat if it advances the Vinculum.

merits.name: Kindred Status
merits.desc: As the general Status Merit, divided into City, Clan, and Covenant Status. If you hold Status in multiple covenants, your total dots of Covenant Status can't exceed five.

merits.name: Kiss of the Succubus
merits.desc: When you inflict Swooning by feeding on a mortal vessel, also inflict Addicted.

merits.name: Lineage
merits.desc: Once per session, you can borrow one dot of your sire's Allies, Contacts, Mentor, Resources, or Status.

merits.name: Pack Alpha
merits.desc: Decide how you ritually mark a vampire or ghoul as part of your pack. Pack members take 8-Again to teamwork support rolls. When questioned by your pack and you don't cow them, lose Willpower. Exile from the pack is violent and lasting.

merits.name: Swarm Form
merits.desc: You can become a swarm of Size 0 or 1 creatures when you take the Beast's Skin. Expand over a space up to (5 × Blood Potency) yards in diameter. Your attacks roll Strength + Brawl, ignore Defense, and deal lethal damage, while attacks against you that don't encompass wide swaths can only deal a point of damage at most.

merits.name: Touchstone
merits.desc: You have an extra Touchstone for each dot in this Merit. Each Touchstone attaches to the next level of Humanity down after the last.

merits.name: Undead Menses
merits.desc: You produce unnatural menstrual blood that, once per night when applied, can grant 8-Again to a Crúac ritual or reduce Resistance against a Discipline by up to your Blood Potency.

merits.name: Unnatural Affinity
merits.desc: Choose another type of supernatural creature for each dot in this Merit. You can feed on their Vitae as if they were Kindred.

merits.name: Unsettling Gaze
merits.desc: When you roll an exceptional success to infect a victim with Integrity or Humanity greater than yours with the monstrous Beast, your victim experiences a breaking point. If your Humanity is greater than 2, so do you.

merits.name: Cacophony Savvy
merits.desc: You can read the Cacophony with Intelligence + Streetwise. Within a vampire's Feeding Grounds, add their (not your) dots in that Merit as bonus dice.

merits.name: Dynasty Membership
merits.desc: Once per session, you can substitute your dynasty's Clan Status for your own on a Social roll.

merits.name: Kindred Status
merits.desc: As for full Kindred. Clan Status requires Clan Impostor.

merits.name: Carthian Pull
merits.desc: Every month, you can leverage favors to access your Carthian Status in dots of Allies, Contacts, Haven or Herd.

merits.name: I Know a Guy
merits.desc: Once per story, your non-temporary dots of Allies can do double duty as dots of Retainer.

merits.name: Night Doctor Surgery
merits.desc: Roll Intelligence + Medicine to treat a vampire medically for an hour, reducing lethal damage to bashing.

merits.name: Lex Terrae
merits.desc: So long as your Feeding Ground has been clearly declared, vampires who feed there without your permission wake the next night and vomit the Vitae out as useless, and are visibly marked for a week.

merits.name: Mandate from the Masses
merits.desc: When you preside over a majority vote of local Carthians to condemn an enemy of the people, you can voluntarily lose access to a dot of Willpower to strip the enemy of Blood Potency proportional to the Carthian vote. Lost dots return when the enemy goes into exile or either you or the enemy are destroyed.

merits.name: Plausible Deniability
merits.desc: Supernatural means can't prove your guilt of crimes against domain or Tradition, diablerie doesn't stain your aura, and you penalize nonmagical efforts to perceive your guilt by your Carthian Status. You can't use your Kindred Status against anyone who ascertains your guilt anyway.

merits.name: Right of Return
merits.desc: You're authorized to participate in multiple covenants. Your total maximum of Covenant Status dots ignores your dots of Carthian Status, and you improve your Social Maneuvering impression with your other affiliated covenants, but lose 10-Again to conceal suspicious behavior from them.

merits.name: Strength of Resolution
merits.desc: When a supernatural power is used to compel you to violate the law of the domain, add your Carthian Status dots as dice to contest it.

merits.name: Altar
merits.desc: You've contributed to attuning a blood altar. In the presence of the altar, contributors can apply teamwork to Crúac rituals, even if they don't know Crúac, at the cost of slowing the ritual.

merits.name: The Mother-Daughter Bond
merits.desc: Apply the benefits of the True Friend Merit to any Acolyte Mentor.

merits.name: Attaché
merits.desc: Your Retainers each gain access to your Invictus Status in dots distributed among Contacts, Resources and Safe Place.

merits.name: Friends in High Places
merits.desc: Every month, you can open up to your Invictus Status in Doors belonging to people held under the local Invictus thumb.

merits.name: Invested
merits.desc: Distribute your dots in Invictus Status among free dots of Herd, Mentor, Resources and Retainer, provided by the covenant.

merits.name: Notary
merits.desc: You're empowered by the Invictus to preside over Invictus Oaths. Invictus Status can't be used in Social rolls against you, and once a month, you can call upon one dot of Allies, Contacts, Herd, Mentor or Resources from the covenant.

merits.name: Speaker for the Silent
merits.desc: You've learned to voluntarily channel the will of a torpid elder. You can cut off an open channel with a point of Willpower.

merits.name: Where the Bodies Are Buried
merits.desc: Once per story for every dot in this Merit, your notes on dirty work can turn up dirt on a vampire whose associations you know.

merits.name: Oath of Action
merits.desc: Swear a labor for your liege. For the duration of the Oath, you may access one of your liege's Disciplines (including bloodline gifts), while your liege's Blood Potency increases by one. The Oath concludes when the labor is complete or a month passes, and respectively the liege or the vassal suffers aggravated damage equal to the Discipline dots offered. You can only be party to one Oath of Action at a time.

merits.name: Oath of Fealty
merits.desc: You can draw up to your Invictus Status in Vitae from your liege each week, without feeding from her. Your liege can tell when you lie to her. You can only swear an Oath of Fealty to one liege at a time.

merits.name: Oath of Penance
merits.desc: For the duration of the Oath, every tenth point of Vitae you ingest is mystically transmitted to your liege as Kindred Vitae, and you are denied the benefits of any other Invictus Oath. Your liege cannot use Disciplines against you.

merits.name: Oath of Serfdom
merits.desc: Receive a feudal territory from your liege. While there, or when defending your liege, you gain a free dot of Celerity, Resilience or Vigor. You intuit when another predatory aura crosses into your land and from where. Your liege adds your dots in Feeding Ground as bonus dice against you, and ignores any blood bond you may impose.

merits.name: Anointed
merits.desc: You're ordained. Once per session, you can roll Presence + Expression to preach the Raptured Condition.

merits.name: Lorekeeper
merits.desc: Your lorehouse attracts occultists. Distribute your dots in the Library Merit among bonus dots in Retainer and Herd.

merits.name: Secret Society Junkie
merits.desc: Dots in Status or Mystery Cult Initiation representing human secret societies also count as dots of Herd.

merits.name: Sworn
merits.desc: Swear yourself to frequent duties either to the silencers of the Axe, learned of the Dying Light, or leaders of the Mysteries. Distribute your dots in Ordo Status among bonus dots of Mentor and Retainer.

merits.name: Area of Expertise
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Resolve •• - Raise one Specialty's die bonus to +2.

merits.name: Common Sense
merits.desc: Once per chapter, roll Wits + Composure as an instant action to ask the Storyteller a question about risks and choices.

merits.name: Danger Sense
merits.desc: +2 bonus to detect an ambush.

merits.name: Direction Sense
merits.desc: Keep perfect track of your relative location and direction, and ignore penalties to navigate or find your way.

merits.name: Eidetic Memory
merits.desc: Ignore rolls for recall or memory. +2 bonus to recall minute facts buried in other information.

merits.name: Encyclopedic Knowledge
merits.desc: Roll Intelligence + Wits to recall useful trivia relating to a particular field or pursuit.

merits.name: Eye for the Strange
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Resolve ••, Occult • - Roll Intelligence + Composure to identify evidence of supernatural involvement.

merits.name: Fast Reflexes
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Wits ''or'' Dexterity ••• - Add Fast Reflexes dots to Initiative.

merits.name: Good Time Management
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Academics ''or'' Science •• - Make extended action rolls in half the necessary time.

merits.name: Holistic Awareness
merits.desc: Roll Wits + Survival to substitute woodland scavengings for equipment when treating patients with Medicine, unless the patient suffers non-bashing wound penalties.

merits.name: Indomitable
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Resolve ••• - +2 to a contesting dice pool or resistance trait applied against supernatural mental influence.

merits.name: Interdisciplinary Specialty
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Any Skill ••• - Choose a Specialty in the corresponding Skill. Apply the Specialty's bonus die to relevant rolls of any Skill, except unskilled rolls.

merits.name: Investigative Aide
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Any Skill ••• - When you roll the selected Skill to uncover clues, achieve exceptional success with only three successes. Add a bonus element to any clues uncovered with this Skill.

merits.name: Investigative Prodigy
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Wits •••, Investigation ••• - When you roll to uncover clues, you uncover a clue per success, capped by your dots in Investigative Prodigy. Clues from extra successes never have more than one element each.

merits.name: Language
merits.desc: You can speak, read and write in a chosen language.

merits.name: Library
merits.desc: You have a cache of information relating to a particular Skill. Add your dots in Library to relevant extended rolls.

merits.name: Meditative Mind
merits.desc: Ignore environmental and wound penalties on meditation rolls. With two dots, meditation grants +3 to Resolve + Composure rolls for the remainder of the day. With four dots, meditation rolls only need to accumulate one success.

merits.name: Multilingual
merits.desc: You can speak conversationally in two chosen languages. Roll Intelligence + Academics for reading comprehension.

merits.name: Patient
merits.desc: Add +2 to your maximum number of allowed rolls on extended actions.

merits.name: Tolerance for Biology
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Resolve ••• - Ignore Resistance rolls from witnessing biological grotesquerie.

merits.name: Trained Observer
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Wits ''or'' Composure ••• - Take 9-Again, or 8-Again with three dots, on Perception rolls.

merits.name: Vice-Ridden
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Vice - Take a second Vice.

merits.name: Virtuous
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Virtue - Take a second Virtue.

merits.name: Ambidextrous
merits.desc: Ignore offhand penalties. Character creation only.

merits.name: Automotive Genius
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Crafts •••, Drive •, Science • - Raise maximum modifications to a vehicle to thrice Crafts rating, plus number of relevant Crafts Specialties.

merits.name: Crack Driver
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Drive ••• - When not taking any non-Drive actions, add your Composure as a bonus to Drive rolls, and penalize attempts to disable your vehicle by your Composure. With three dots, you can take a reflexive Drive action once per turn.

merits.name: Demolisher
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Strength ''or'' Intelligence ••• - When breaking objects, ignore a point of Durability per dot of Demolisher.

merits.name: Double Jointed
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Dexterity ••• - Dislodge joints at will. Escape from mundane bondage automatically. When grappled and not acting aggressively, penalize your attacker's overpowering rolls by your Dexterity.

merits.name: Fleet of Foot
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Athletics •• - Add dots in Fleet of Foot to your Speed, and penalize pursuit rolls in a foot chase by your Fleet of Foot dots.

merits.name: Giant
merits.desc: +1 Size. Character creation only.

merits.name: Greyhound
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Athletics •••, Wits •••, Stamina ••• - Succeed exceptionally on three successes in a chase action.

merits.name: Hardy
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Stamina ••• - Add Hardy dots as a bonus to rolls against disease, poison, deprivation, suffocation and unconsciousness.

merits.name: Iron Stamina
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Stamina ''or'' Resolve ••• - Ignore penalties from fatigue or wounds up to your rating in Iron Stamina.

merits.name: Quick Draw
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Wits ••• - Whenever your Defense is available, you can draw a weapon that falls under a chosen Weaponry or Firearms Specialty as a reflexive action.

merits.name: Relentless
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Athletics ••, Stamina ••• - Add 2 to the successes needed against you in a chase.

merits.name: Seizing the Edge
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Wits •••, Composure ••• - You get the Edge in the first turn of a chase, and if your opponent fails a roll as if being ambushed, you can calculate your target successes without their Speed or Initiative.

merits.name: Sleight of Hand
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Larceny ••• - You can take a Larceny instant action reflexively once per turn, and victims of your Larceny can't notice your attempts if they aren't specifically looking for them.

merits.name: Small-Framed
merits.desc: -1 Size. Take a +2 bonus to hide, go unnoticed, or otherwise benefit from your size. Character creation only.

merits.name: Allies
merits.desc: You have influence and goodwill with a chosen group proportional to your dots in this Merit. Each session, you can call on your Allies for favors of a value rated 1 to 5 by the Storyteller, up to your rating in the Merit. Favors in excess require a roll of Manipulation + Persuasion + Allies.

merits.name: Alternate Identity
merits.desc: You've laid groundwork establishing a false identity: an informal history with one dot, a veneer of documentation with two, or an airtight paper trail with three. +1 to Subterfuge rolls to maintain the false identity, or +2 with three dots.

merits.name: Anonymity
merits.desc: Prerequisites: ''No Fame'' - Penalize attempts to find you by paper trail or living evidence by a die per Anonymity dot.

merits.name: Barfly
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Socialize •• - You can get in anywhere socially. Penalize attempts to recognize you as out of place by your Socialize dots.

merits.name: Closed Book
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Manipulation •••, Resolve ••• - Add dots in this Merit to your number of Doors, and as a die bonus to contest Social assessment actions.

merits.name: Contacts
merits.desc: Choose a group or field for each dot of Contacts. You can roll Manipulation + (relevant Social Skill) to gather information or dirt from acquaintances in any of these groups or fields.

merits.name: Fame
merits.desc: Prerequisites: ''No Anonymity'' - You're known for something, locally or selectively with one dot, broadly in an area with two dots, or universally with three. Add Fame dots as a die bonus to Social rolls targeting those impressed by your reputation, and to rolls by other characters to find or identify you.

merits.name: Fixer
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Contacts ••, Wits ••• - Obtain services as if they were one Availability dot lower.

merits.name: Hobbyist Clique
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Any Skill •• - So long as you keep up with your fellow hobbyists, their support provides 9-Again to roll your hobby Skill, and a +2 die bonus to extended actions using that Skill.

merits.name: Inspiring
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Presence ••• - Roll Presence + Expression to confer the Inspired Condition.

merits.name: Iron Will
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Resolve •••• - When you spend Willpower to contest or resist Social influence, substitute your Resolve rating for the usual Willpower bonus. If the roll is contested, take 8-Again.

merits.name: Mentor
merits.desc: You have a guide who expects something from you proportional to his or her influence, as measured by your dots in Mentor. Choose three traits out of the list of Skills plus the Resources Merit. Once per session, your Mentor can provide aid that falls within one of these traits, achieving automatic success.

merits.name: Pusher
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Persuasion •• - When you use soft leverage, improve your impression as if you'd also satisfied the mark's Vice.

merits.name: Resources
merits.desc: You have disposable income proportional to your dots in this Merit. Once per session, you can securely procure an item or service with an Availability that doesn't exceed your Resources rating, including any reasonable number of items or services whose Availability is exceeded by your Resources by two dots. You can acquire an item or service with an Availability one point above your Resources rating at the cost of reducing your effective Resources by a dot for a month.

merits.name: Retainer
merits.desc: You have a mook. Your underling's dice pool is twice their Retainer rating for actions within their purview, or equal to their Retainer rating for actions outside it.

merits.name: Safe Place
merits.desc: You've secured a place from intrusion. While there, add the Safe Place rating to your Initiative. Penalize rolls to break in by Safe Place. If you have Crafts dots, you can trap it, forcing intruders to roll Dexterity + Larceny - Safe Place to avoid lethal damage up to the Safe Place's rating. Multiple characters can contribute dots to a Safe Place and share the full resulting rating.

merits.name: Small Unit Tactics
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Presence ••• - Once per scene when you coordinate allies, you can spend Willpower as an instant action to confer the die bonus to a number of allies up to your Presence rating.

merits.name: Spin Doctor
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Manipulation •••, Subterfuge •• - Using Tainted Clues inflicts an additional -1 penalty instead of consuming any successes.

merits.name: Staff
merits.desc: You have employees corresponding to one Skill per dot of Staff. They can achieve a single automatic success at relevant actions using one of those Skills.

merits.name: Status
merits.desc: You have influence as part of a chosen group. You can draw on their facilities and resources, block the use of a relevant Social Merit lower than your Status rating once per session, and apply Status as a die bonus to Social rolls drawing on your influence.

merits.name: Striking Looks
merits.desc: Your appearance is noteworthy and memorable. Add Striking Looks as a die bonus to Social rolls that benefit from your appearance, and to rolls by other characters to notice or remember you.

merits.name: Sympathetic
merits.desc: When you engage in Social Maneuvering, you can accept a Condition such as Leveraged or Swooning to immediately open two Doors.

merits.name: Table Turner
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Composure •••, Manipulation •••, Wits ••• - When targeted by Social Maneuvering, you can spend Willpower to preemptively respond with a Social action of your own.

merits.name: Takes One to Know One
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Vice - When you investigate an incident that resonates with your Vice, instead of suffering the normal -2 penalty, your roll gains +2 dice and 9-Again. Succeeding on the roll satisfies your Vice.

merits.name: Taste
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Crafts •• - Choose a Specialty in Crafts or Expression. You can roll Wits + (Skill in question) to draw information about the nature of a work that falls within the chosen Specialty.

merits.name: True Friend
merits.desc: You have an unbreakable bond of friendship with a chosen character. Rolls to influence your friend to your detriment suffer a -5 penalty. Once per story, you can recover one Willpower through a meaningful interaction with your friend.

merits.name: Untouchable
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Manipulation •••, Subterfuge •• - You're a smooth criminal. Rolls to investigate your deeds must achieve an exceptional success or else turn up Incomplete Clues.

merits.name: Esoteric Armory
merits.desc: You've collected enough esoterica to supply the banes of ephemeral entities with a Rank up to your rating in this Merit.

merits.name: Cheap Shot
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Street Fighting •••, Subterfuge •• - During a fight, you can reflexively contest Dexterity + Subterfuge against Wits + Composure to deny an opponent Defense next turn through dirty tricks and distractions.

merits.name: Choke Hold
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Brawl •• - After a successful Hold, add the Choke grapple maneuver: accumulates successes across multiple turns to knock unconscious for a few minutes.

merits.name: Defensive Combat
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Brawl • or Weaponry • - You can substitute the chosen Skill for Athletics when calculating your Defense, as long as you're currently equipped to make attacks with that Skill.

merits.name: Fighting Finesse
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Dexterity ••• - You can substitute Dexterity for Strength when making rolls with a chosen Brawl or Weaponry Specialty.

merits.name: Iron Skin
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Martial Arts ''or'' Street Fighting ••, Stamina ••• - Confers half your Iron Skin dots in points of general Armor against bashing attacks. When hurt, you can spend Willpower to reduce half your Iron Skin dots in lethal damage to bashing.

merits.name: Shiv
merits.desc: Prerequisites: Street Fighting ••, Weaponry • - You can conceal a 0L brawling weapon with one dot, or 1L with two, on your person. Penalize rolls to detect it by your Weaponry.
